person.persName: Leonard Bentley, Sr. (Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Grigsby Benrley on April 8, 1856. Father of Judith Bentley, Ellen G. Bentley, Clementine W. Bentley, Leonard Bentley Jr., and Sallie Bentley. Farmer in Henderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 102; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Smiths Mill, p. 20; Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Henderson County, Kentucky, April 8, 1856.
